amendment.description: To specify a term of service for the National Intelligence Director.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3761 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 4. Record Vote Number: 191.
Amendment SA 3761 proposed by Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S9883-9890, S9896-9897; text: CR S9883) To specify a term of service for the National Intelligence Director.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3761 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 4. Record Vote Number: 191.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3761 proposed by Senator Specter.
